title: Blork the orc
data:

|   | A particularly fat and ugly orc. He's scavenged a pair of rainbow-coloured suspenders from somewhere. They're not helping. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 Trivia](#Trivia)
- [6 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Blork the orc** is a unique [orcish](/Orc "Orc") spellcaster who can cast a few low-level [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") and buff himself significantly. He occasionally spawns with a strong weapon, like a [battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") or [glaive](/Glaive "Glaive").

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):4-6

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                 |                                                     |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost") (3d5) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Cantrip](/Cantrip "Cantrip")                   | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame") (3d5) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") (3d4)    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Blork is basically a beefier [orc wizard](/Orc_wizard "Orc wizard"). He has more attack spells and [Haste](/Haste "Haste"), but lacks [Confuse](/Confuse "Confuse"). Because he can haste himself, it's more difficult to run away. Otherwise, unless he spawns with a big weapon, you can treat him like a strong orc wizard.
- If you worship [Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh"), he may join you as a follower.

## Trivia

- Blork the orc is a reference to Mork from Ork, a rainbow-suspenders-wearing alien from the 70's television show "[Mork & Mindy](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mork_%26_Mindy)".
- If you [polymorph](/Polymorph "Polymorph") him, his name will change accordingly (e.g. he might become Blork the [centaur](/Centaur "Centaur")).

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), Blork the orc will become **Blorkula the orcula**, a vampire that splits into multiple randomly-colored vampire bats when he dies. Additionally:

  - He will gain the [Sting](/Sting "Sting"), [Sandblast](/Sandblast "Sandblast"), and [Shock](/Shock "Shock") spells. [Cantrip](/Cantrip "Cantrip") and [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") will be removed from his spell list.
  - He will gain a second attack with the vampiric [attack flavour](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour").
  - He will spawn in D:5-8 instead of D:4-6.

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), he could cast [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility") when low on health.
html:
Blork the orc

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Blork the orc o 
HP 20-42
HD 3
XP 95
Speed 10
AC 0
EV 9
Will 20
Attack1 7 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type orc, orc
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Male
A particularly fat and ugly orc. He's scavenged a pair of rainbow-coloured suspenders from somewhere. They're not helping.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 Trivia
  • 6 History

Useful Info

Blork the orc is a unique orcish spellcaster who can cast a few low-level Conjurations and buff himself significantly. He occasionally spawns with a strong weapon, like a battleaxe or glaive.

Location

  • The Dungeon:4-6

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Throw Frost (3d5) Wizard flag
Slot2 Cantrip Wizard flag
Slot3 Haste Wizard flag
Slot4 Throw Flame (3d5) Wizard flag
Slot5 Magic Dart (3d4) Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Blork is basically a beefier orc wizard. He has more attack spells and Haste, but lacks Confuse. Because he can haste himself, it's more difficult to run away. Otherwise, unless he spawns with a big weapon, you can treat him like a strong orc wizard.
  • If you worship Beogh, he may join you as a follower.

Trivia

  • Blork the orc is a reference to Mork from Ork, a rainbow-suspenders-wearing alien from the 70's television show "Mork & Mindy".
  • If you polymorph him, his name will change accordingly (e.g. he might become Blork the centaur).

History

  • In 0.32, Blork the orc will become Blorkula the orcula, a vampire that splits into multiple randomly-colored vampire bats when he dies. Additionally:
    • He will gain the Sting, Sandblast, and Shock spells. Cantrip and Magic Dart will be removed from his spell list.
    • He will gain a second attack with the vampiric attack flavour.
    • He will spawn in D:5-8 instead of D:4-6.
  • Prior to 0.27, he could cast Invisibility when low on health.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Blork_the_orc&oldid=80369"

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Blork the orc''' is a unique [[orc]]ish spellcaster who can cast a few low-level [[Conjurations]] and buff himself significantly. He occasionally spawns with a strong weapon, like a [[battleaxe]] or [[glaive]].

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:4-6

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Blork is basically a beefier [[orc wizard]]. He has more attack spells and [[Haste]], but lacks [[Confuse]]. Because he can haste himself, it's more difficult to run away. Otherwise, unless he spawns with a big weapon, you can treat him like a strong orc wizard.
*If you worship [[Beogh]], he may join you as a follower.

==Trivia==
*Blork the orc is a reference to Mork from Ork, a rainbow-suspenders-wearing alien from the 70's television show "[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mork_%26_Mindy Mork & Mindy]".
*If you [[polymorph]] him, his name will change accordingly (e.g. he might become Blork the [[centaur]]).

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|Blork the orc will become '''Blorkula the orcula''', a vampire that splits into multiple randomly-colored vampire bats when he dies. Additionally:}}
**He will gain the [[Sting]], [[Sandblast]], and [[Shock]] spells. [[Cantrip]] and [[Magic Dart]] will be removed from his spell list.
**He will gain a second attack with the vampiric [[attack flavour]].
**He will spawn in D:5-8 instead of D:4-6.
*Prior to [[0.27]], he could cast [[Invisibility]] when low on health.

[[Category:Orc]]
